content.query:
-- Create external data source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE MyDataSource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://tigeryihw1storage.dfs.core.windows.net/data'
);
GO

-- Create external file format
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetFileFormat
WITH (
FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET
);
GO

-- Create external table ExternalWeather
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ExternalWeather(
    clouds_all SMALLINT,
    humidity SMALLINT,
    pressure SMALLINT,
    temp_K FLOAT,
    temp_min_K FLOAT,
    temp_max_K FLOAT,
    feels_like_K FLOAT,
    wind_deg SMALLINT,
    wind_gust FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    rain_1h REAL,
    corrected_timestamp INT,
    location NVARCHAR(100),
    date_time DATETIME,
    id NVARCHAR(100),
    temp_C FLOAT,
    temp_min_C FLOAT,
    temp_max_C FLOAT,
    feels_like_C FLOAT,
    temp_F FLOAT,
    temp_min_F FLOAT,
    temp_max_F FLOAT,
    feels_like_F FLOAT,
    lat FLOAT,
    lon FLOAT,
    weather_id_value INT,
    weather_main_value NVARCHAR(100),
    weather_description_value NVARCHAR(100),
    weather_icon_value NVARCHAR(100)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'gold/processed_weather/parquet/weather.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = MyDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
);
GO
